explains: adj. 侮辱的，无礼的；污蔑的；损害人体的
v. 侮辱；损害（insult 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: add insult to injury 雪上加霜；伤害之外又加侮辱

sentences.en: A kid I used to be friends with turned against me after being told that I'd been insulting him.
sentences.cn: 一个与我曾经是朋友的年轻人在被告知我一直在污蔑他后就和我反目成仇了。

sentences.en: Many a brisk argument or an insulting quarrel breaks out as the weary queues push and shove each other to get on buses and tubes.
sentences.cn: 当疲惫的队伍推推搡搡挤上公共汽车或地铁时，许多刻薄的争论或侮辱性的争吵爆发了。

sentences.en: She was really insulting to me.
